ygData.subject: Re: Washington crosses the Delaware
ygData.msgSnippet: Cyberwolf, please keep in mind that there is no where to land near the Iron Fist (closest place is the shore of Spain, 3 miles away) while the shields are up

Cyberwolf, please keep in mind that there is no where to land near 
the Iron Fist (closest place is the shore of Spain, 3 miles away) 
while the shields are up (shields cover the entire island plus a 
dozen of feet or so. They also extend underwater). So, there would be 
no cover for your troops to hide, save underwater, where the Iron 
Fist also has defences.

Also, keep in mind that Zardus had a lockdown on the area where 
Gotron shot at Lady Hawk, so she wouldn't be able to get out of the 
Iron Fist.

Also, the Iron Fist is a giant battle cruiser, it'd take a while to 
penetrate deep enough to take out the power source, provided you can 
get through the shields.

::Iron Fist/Zardus/DevilDuer/Havoc/Slayer/Lavacons::

The Iron Fist's shields flashed to life as gunfire was detected. 
Lasers and missiles hit against the shields, doing next to nothing. 
The defence systems respond, two signature-seeking missiles firing at 
each of the attackers, and three laser batteries opening fire as well.

Inside the Iron Fist, Zardus laughs as he sees the report of an 
attack. With nowhere to hide, these attackers wouldn't last long at 
all...

"Nemesis, the Iron Fist is under attack," he says into his 
comm, "Finish up at the Cybertronian Fire as soon as you can. These 
attackers arn't any trouble at all, but there arn't many bots here 
right now. Destroy the Maximals if you can, else get back here."

With that, he set off down the hallway, toward the exit of the Iron 
Fist. While walking, he activated his comm, sending orders to the 
Lavacons and DevilDuer.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer arrived at the new pod, activating his comm. If he didn't 
have his suit on, the pressure of the water would have crushed him in 
seconds.

"This is DevilDuer, an alliance bot. Please identify yourself," he 
says over the comm to the new bot, recieving the orders from Zardus 
and keeping them in mind.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
At the Cybertronian Fire, the Lavacons recieve Zardus's orders, 
splitting up into seperate bots and boosting off toward the Iron Fist.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Havoc sighs, hearing the sounds of battle outside.

"Guess we fight here instead of the CF," he says to Vlad, 
transforming into robot mode and flying out of the Iron Fist. He 
fires two missiles at Slayer, who was just flying into sight.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer dives under two missiles, growling when several shots from the 
Iron Fist hit him, leaving deep dents in his armor. This warship 
seemed to have more power than the average ones. Slayer had flown 
behind Prebon's group and got here seconds after. He thought that 
attacking a full fledged battle cruiser rather than picking on a 
crippled ship like they were going to was pretty stupid, but he kept 
his oppinions to himself.

Slayer fires several shots at Havoc, but they don't penetrate the 
shields.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Prebon sees the first set of bots rush out of the Iron 
Fist. "ATTACK" he yells pointing in the direction of the enemy. He 
picked up his constrictor rifle and fired five shots at Sharpedge.
> He pulled the pin on a flash grenade and tossed it in front of the 
counterattackers. The flash was harmless it was designed to disrupt 
thier sight long enough to advance.
> 
> Hammer Ducks behind cover as the missles hit. He pops his head up 
just on time to feel a series ofpistol shots hit him in the chest to 
stomach region. He fell back behind the cover that had saved him from 
the missles. 
> 
> Blaze fired her disrupror again, this time at the area of the ship 
that held the power unit. Without power the ship would be defenseless.
> 
> Bullit fired two missles from his wrist, and five imploder blasts 
from his rifle at Godfather. The blasts would destroy a target from 
the outside in.

Hammer and
